name: Twin_Peaks:_The_First_Season
text:
Twin Peaks: The First Season
Twin Peaks: The First Season is a 2001 DVD release of the first season of Twin Peaks, excluding the pilot episode.
Features

Disc 1
Episode 1
Episode Supplements
Commentary by director Duwayne Dunham
script notes
Log Lady intro
Episode 2
Episode Supplements
Commentary by director of photography Frank Byers
script notes
Log Lady intro
Disc 2
Episode 3
Episode Supplements
Commentary by director Tina Rathborne
script notes
Log Lady intro
Episode 4
Episode Supplements
Commentary by director Tim Hunter and writer Robert Engels
script notes
Log Lady intro
Disc 3
Episode 5
Episode Supplements
Commentary by director Lesli Linka Glatter
script notes
Log Lady intro
Episode 6
Episode Supplements
Commentary by director Caleb Deschanel and writer Harley Peyton
script notes
Log Lady intro
Disc 4
Episode 7
Episode Supplements
Commentary by production designer Richard Hoover
script notes
Log Lady intro
Mark Frost Telephone Interview (14:35) — The 2 founders of Wrapped in Plastic interview Mark Frost
Learning to Speak in the Red Room (3:39)
An Introduction to David Lynch (21:27)
17 Pieces of Pie (9:43) — Interview with Mar-T Diner proprietor Pat Cokewell
The Twin Peaks Directory (60 min.)
